I have no real advice to add to this topic: but a thought that came to me w=
hile reading your messages.

What if there is 'crime' in the ethereal as we=
ll as our physical world (from the good vs evil idea) ... and maybe an ener=
gy can possess or draw from another less powerful energy and 'change' it?

=
What do you think?

ject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: insulted by the spirits

            If =
you are hearing spirits, that's not EVP, but Clairaudience. Another thing t=
o note is she may or may not have been talking to you at all. They talk amo=
ngst themselves a lot more than to us. She was probably not even talking to=
 you. I'm not sure why people always assume energies are always talking to =
them or label them "evil" because of the sound of the voice they are modula=
ting. That's a great error in my opinion. A really nice energy might sound =
like a stereotypical Hollywood "demon". To stereotype energies, to me, is j=
ust silly.=A0
w.

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;">I have no real advice to add to this topic: but a thought that came to me while reading your messages.<br><br>What if there is 'crime' in the ethereal as well as our physical world (from the good vs evil idea) ... and maybe an energy can possess or draw from another less powerful energy and 'change' it?<br><br>What do you think?<br><br>--- On <b>Wed, 11/26/08, black bear hollow <i><blackbearhollow@...></i></b> wrote:<br><blockquote style="border-left: 2px solid rgb(16, 16, 255); margin-left: 5px; padding-left: 5px;">From: black bear hollow <blackbearhollow@...><br>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: insulted by the spirits<br>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<br>Date: Wednesday, November 26, 2008, 4:08 PM<br><br><div id="yiv1878171638">





    <div id="ygrp-text">
            <p>If you are hearing spirits, that's not EVP, but Clairaudience. Another thing to note is she may or may not have been talking to you at all. They talk amongst themselves a lot more than to us. She was probably not even talking to you. I'm not sure why people always assume energies are always talking to them or label them "evil" because of the sound of the voice they are modulating. That's a great error in my opinion. A really nice energy might sound like a stereotypical Hollywood "demon". To stereotype energies, to me, is just silly. </p><div><br></div><div>w.<br><div><div>On Nov 26, 2008, at 6:35 PM, neli neilim wrote:</div><br class="Apple-interchange-newline"><blockquote type="cite"><span class="Apple-style-span" style="border-collapse: separate; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Georgia; font-size: 13px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent:
 0px;"><div>Al,</div><div> </div><div>That's impossible cause I do EVP with others that are great, it seems that that woman changed her bad humor lately, cause now is like if wanting to apologize, or to be kind, but I don't trust her. It seems that someone else took control on her and put her off or maybe was reprimanded by another spirit, cause sometimes I can hear some of them talking between them, chatting as we do.</div><div> </div><div>Neli</div></span><br class="Apple-interchange-newline"></blockquote></div><br></div>
    </div>  


	 
	
	</div></blockquote></td></tr></table><br>
